componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: You need to own the case to use this component

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This is only available when the case is Open.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please change the Case Status to In Progress before Re-Routing.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Your status is currently Out of Office.

You will continue to receive new cases, but any replies from customers will be routed to the next available agent. You can update your status from the Out of Office shortcut in the utility bar located at the bottom of the page.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This case may be linked to an Embedded Payroll Account. Please check the Panda page for the Gusto Embedded Company pill and assign the GEP CX Team by selecting "Route to GEP CX" from the Re-Route tool. Thank you.

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: (1 AND (2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5) OR ((2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND (1 OR (6 AND 8) OR (7 AND 8)))

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
This account is part of a new service offering pilot. Please redirect all cases to their assigned Technical Account Manager, who is listed on the Details Tab of the Account page under

"Account Information."
